title: Fibonnaci's Everlasting Influence

fields.name: - Chain Break:
fields.value: A card ending in 13, 21, 34, 55, 89, 144, 233, 377, 610, or 987 is played. Better brush up on them.

desc:
Post 2410
- Cards that end in 1, 2, 3, 5, and 8 or are part of the Fibonnaci sequence gain the ⛓️ color while this card is up. He doesn't like 0 here apparently.
